November 25, 1940
Mr. Frank E. Schooley
Executive Secretary
The National Association
of Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
My dear Frank:
Here are my thoughts on your letter of
November 20th:
1. 1 think you ought to remind the individual
stations about BMI but let them take their own action.
2. Joe Wright’s idea is good; in that way we
can formally go on record.
Thanks for the return of the BMI corres¬
pondence. You are absolutely right about not having
our group get involved in the present scrap. It’s
a cinch we haven’t anything to lose in the long run.
Best regards,
